verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Friday] , [ARG0: the Associated Press] [V: reported] [ARG1: that in early 2017 , President Donald Trump and then - FBI Director James Comey agreed there should be a crackdown on leaks from within the administration . But the AP reporters refused to apply any form of the word " leak " to Comey 's release of a memo through an intermediary to the New York Times in May 2017 — even though it did when the leak]
